infos.value: ...Oh? Well, if it isn't th' backstabbing knight who betrayed Fennes...
Wave your forked tongue elsewhere! We see through your lies!
Brought another brave knight with yer too, eh?
Come to unhead me before Hourne's troops arrive, have yer?
Lilyth, was it? I remember yer.
And there's something yer should remember. Yer don't have th' mettle to beat me.
I've changed. And this time...I'm not alone!
What's changed? Nothing. One slug? Two slugs? Yer cannot lay a finger on me.
Enough of the boasts. Ready your blade!
Heh heh heh. The First Sword o' th' ≪Solidus≫ royal guard? Been a while since I had a bit o' fun.
